Initial Middle Goal - Figure 1: Value-Implicit Pre-training (VIP). Pre-trained on large-scale, in-the-wild human videos, frozen VIP network can provide visual reward and representation for downstream unseen robotics tasks and enable diverse visuomotor control strategies without any task-specific fine-tuning.
